title: The Unexpected Journey of Bob Flores: From Producer to Protector
summary: Bob Flores, a 48-year-old producer and advisor, discovers his superpowers and becomes a hero over the course of a week, saving his city from an eerie threat.
summaryGerman: Bob Flores, ein 48-jähriger Produzent und Berater, entdeckt seine Superkräfte und wird im Laufe einer Woche zum Helden, der seine Stadt vor einer unheimlichen Bedrohung rettet.
summaryDutch: Bob Flores, een 48-jarige producent en adviseur, ontdekt zijn superkrachten en wordt in de loop van een week een held, die zijn stad redt van een griezelige dreiging.
summaryFrench: Bob Flores, un producteur et conseiller de 48 ans, découvre ses superpouvoirs et devient un héros au cours d'une semaine, sauvant sa ville d'une menace étrange.

story.text: Bob Flores starts his week with a typical morning at his production company. While reviewing new scripts, he suddenly experiences a vivid vision of an impending disaster in the city.

Determined to understand his vision, Bob seeks the advice of an old friend who is knowledgeable about ancient mythologies and superpowers. They speculate that his advising skills might be evolving into something much greater.
Bob's powers manifest physically for the first time when he inadvertently stops a small fire in his office with a mere thought. Excited and scared, he starts to believe in his newfound abilities.

To test his control, Bob attempts to avert various small incidents around the city. He successfully helps a young couple avoid a traffic accident, feeling a deep satisfaction in his role as a guardian.
Bob's confidence grows, but so does the burden of his responsibility. He spends the night on a skyscraper's roof, contemplating the extent of his powers and his duty to protect his city.

The predicted disaster begins to unfold, and Bob leaps into action. Using a combination of foresight and sheer willpower, he manages to coordinate the city's emergency services to mitigate the impact.
After a grueling 24 hours, the city is safe once again. Bob, exhausted but fulfilled, returns to his normal life, knowing he's ready to intervene whenever needed.

ending: Bob Flores had once shaped stories, and now he had become one.
moral: With great power comes great responsibility.
